resources.string: Please enter both ID and password.
White milk with 3 scoops of chocolate ice cream and chocolate drizzle will fill up sugar!
Handmade cheesecake with domestic rice castella, organic chestnuts, mascarpone and Kiri cheese. Make sure you eat it!!!! Garosu-gil Dangok!!! @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
Salt milk waffle, a crispy waffle with a little salt and fresh cream for a sweet and salty taste
A drink with a tangy taste that mixes grapefruit pulp with water, sugar, and carbonated water!
Tickets for the dessert fair will be drawn on December 25, 2024!
Space characters cannot be used in the ID.
ID can be created with upper and lower case English letters, numbers, and special characters ($@!%*#?&).
This ID is already in use.
Please fill in the password and name fields.
Password must be at least 8 characters including letters, numbers, and special characters ($@!%*#?&).
Oolong tea & Earl Grey Bread Pudding
If you enjoy oolong tea and earl grey bread pudding together, you\'ll feel twice full
Premium Oolong tea grown one by one from selected Da Won! It\'s really delicious.
From fragrant earl grey, bitter cacao nibs, and crunchy walnuts. Try some delicious bread pudding that\'s not too sweet or bitter.
It\'s a combination of bitter and deep and sweet and refreshing, as if you\'re sitting under a cool shade on a hot summer day and enjoying the scent of a spring day. How harmonious is this?

It\'s a black water that\'s lightly burnt in cold water, giving you a cool feeling like ice on a dark green summer day. The taste is bitter and deep, and it cools you down, so it\'s great to fight off the heat.

It\'s a delicacy made of red strawberries and sweet cream in layers between soft white bread. The taste is both sweet and refreshing, so when you take a bite, you feel like you\'re in a bright flower field on a spring day.
Cold Brew Coffee & Salty Milk Cream Waffle
A combination of salted milk whipped cream waffles with a sweet and salty taste, and cold brew to balance out the slightly greasy taste.
Unlike regular coffee, this coffee is steeped in cold water for a long time, making it less bitter and smoother to drink.
This dessert is made by adding a little salt to fresh milk cream to create a sweet-salty balance and reduce the greasiness.
Chocolate latte made of dark chocolate and cookies full of yellow cheese
Belgian Dark Chocolate Meets Domestic A++ Milk! Get a deeper and deeper flavor.
Sweet yellow cheese cookies! Once you taste it, you can\'t get out of it.
